roleset.name: avoid, keep away
roleset.note: WARD_OFF-V NOTES: I haven't actually seen any explicit instruments, but it could happen, ie: (from ward.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The company]-1 earlier this year adopted a shareholder-rights plan *trace*-1 to ward off unwanted suitors.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: My main criticism is not about hanging up on the caller because the program 's hosts know more about the circumstances and " warding off evil takes priority over seeking interest " .
